Name: Marousi
Description: A major suburb in North Athens, known for its business centers, retail hubs, and residential areas.

Name: Kifisia
Description: An affluent northern suburb known for its green spaces, luxurious homes, and shopping areas.

Name: Pefki
Description: A residential area known for its parks, quiet atmosphere, and family-friendly environment.

Name: Nea Erythrea
Description: A quiet suburban municipality known for its residential areas and local amenities.

Name: Vrilissia
Description: A peaceful suburb with green spaces, residential buildings, and a friendly community.

Name: Chalandri
Description: A lively northern suburb with a mix of residential and commercial areas, known for its cafes and shops.
